languages.text: "Приношу официальные извинения от лица {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}. Мы вынуждены складировать грузы оружия и взрывчатки на территории аванпоста, чтобы живая десятина до них не добралась".

"I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."
languages.original_text: "Приношу официальные извинения от лица {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}. Мы вынуждены складировать грузы оружия и взрывчатки за стенами аванпоста, чтобы живая десятина до них не добралась".

traits.locale_text: "I formally apologize on behalf of the Adeptus Arbites. We are forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives outside the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."
"I formally apologize on behalf of the Adeptus Arbites. We are forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives outside the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

"I formally apologise for this on behalf of the Adeptus Arbites. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives outside the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

"I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

"I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

languages.text: «Quiero ofrecer una disculpa formal por este asunto en nombre del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Hemos tenido que acumular envíos de armas y explosivos en el interior de este puesto para evitar que el diezmo viviente se haga con ellos».
languages.original_text: "I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero ofrecer una disculpa formal por este asunto en nombre del Adeptus Arbites. Hemos tenido que acumular envíos de armas y explosivos en el interior de este puesto para evitar que el diezmo viviente se haga con ellos».

«Quiero ofrecer una disculpa formal por este asunto en nombre del Adeptus Arbites. Hemos tenido que acumular envíos de armas y explosivos en el interior de este puesto para evitar que el diezmo viviente se haga con ellos».

languages.text: “对此，我代表{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}正式道歉。我们不得不在哨站的高墙内部囤积武器和炸药，以防生物资源占领哨站。”
languages.original_text: "I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

traits.locale_text: “对此，我代表帝国法务部正式道歉。我们不得不在哨站的高墙内部囤积武器和炸药，以防生物资源占领哨站。”
“对此，我代表帝国法务部正式道歉。我们不得不在哨站的高墙内部囤积武器和炸药，以防生物资源占领哨站。”

languages.text: 「私はこれについて{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局{/g}を代表して正式に謝罪します。我々は生きている租税が武器と爆発物の貨物にアクセスしないように前哨基地の壁の内側にそれらを備蓄しなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこれについて高等裁定局を代表して正式に謝罪します。我々は生きている租税が武器と爆発物の貨物にアクセスしないように前哨基地の壁の内側にそれらを備蓄しなければなりません」
「私はこれについて高等裁定局を代表して正式に謝罪します。我々は生きている租税が武器と爆発物の貨物にアクセスしないように前哨基地の壁の内側にそれらを備蓄しなければなりません」

languages.text: « Au nom de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}, je vous présente nos plus plates excuses pour ce désagrément. Nous avons été contraints d'entreposer les réserves d'armes et d'explosifs dans l'enceinte de l'avant-poste pour empêcher la dîme vivante de s'en emparer. »
languages.original_text: "I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de l'Adeptus Arbites, je vous présente nos plus plates excuses pour ce désagrément. Nous avons été contraints d'entreposer les réserves d'armes et d'explosifs dans l'enceinte de l'avant-poste pour empêcher la dîme vivante de s'en emparer. »

« Au nom de l'Adeptus Arbites, je vous présente nos plus plates excuses pour ce désagrément. Nous avons été contraints d'entreposer les réserves d'armes et d'explosifs dans l'enceinte de l'avant-poste pour empêcher la dîme vivante de s'en emparer. »

languages.text: "Bu durumdan ötürü {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} adına resmen özür dilerim. Canlı aşarın ele geçirmesini engellemek maksadıyla silah ve patlayıcı sevkiyatlarını karakol duvarları dâhilinde stoklamak zorunda kaldık."
languages.original_text: "I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu durumdan ötürü Adeptus Arbites adına resmen özür dilerim. Canlı aşarın ele geçirmesini engellemek maksadıyla silah ve patlayıcı sevkiyatlarını karakol duvarları dâhilinde stoklamak zorunda kaldık."

"Bu durumdan ötürü {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} adına resmen özür dilerim. Canlı aşarın ele geçirmesini engellemek maksadıyla silah ve patlayıcı sevkiyatlarını karakol duvarları dâhilinde stoklamak zorunda kaldık."

languages.text: "Ich muss mich im Namen des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} hierfür entschuldigen. Wir waren gezwungen, Waffen und Sprengstoff im Außenposten zu lagern, um dem lebenden Zehnt den Zugriff darauf zu verwehren."
languages.original_text: "I formally apologise for this on behalf of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. We have been forced to stockpile shipments of weapons and explosives within the walls of the outpost to keep the living tithe from getting to them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss mich im Namen des Adeptus Arbites hierfür entschuldigen. Wir waren gezwungen, Waffen und Sprengstoff im Außenposten zu lagern, um dem lebenden Zehnt den Zugriff darauf zu verwehren."
"Ich muss mich im Namen des Adeptus Arbites hierfür entschuldigen. Wir waren gezwungen, Waffen und Sprengstoff im Außenposten zu lagern, um dem lebenden Zehnt den Zugriff darauf zu verwehren."
